entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -22.4°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
